text:
I currently have a module using HubDB and within that has a dropdown of types such as Case Study, White Paper, Guide, etc. whenever you select one of those chocies it filters correctly.

I am looking to create a new page just for Case Studies, but I want the module to be created, so a content person can choose which type they want to display on that page. Is there a way to do that? I know there is a HubDB Row field, but I guess I need a HubDB Column field. Thanks!
